title: Chapter 1844 - As Wine Enters My Stomach, I Feel As Joyous As The Wind
body:
Chapter 1844 - As Wine Enters My Stomach, I Feel As Joyous As The Wind

One slash, and he’d injured Luo Tiandu. That terrifying, tyrannical strike had crushing, unstoppable force! 

Xi Ning and Fan Zhui were watching from a distance. Both of them were astonished.

Endless Lightning, Eternal Silence and the Frenzied Demon Battle Intent were Luo Tiandu’s trump cards.

The first was his innate divine ability, and it was famous throughout the God Domain for its extreme destructive power. It was ranked among the hundred greatest divine abilities of the God Domain.

The Frenzied Demon Battle Intent was even more terrifying. This power originated from Luo Tiandu’s bloodline, and when he used it, his strength soared by thirty percent!

This was another of Luo Tiandu’s reserve killer weapons. Luo Tiandu had used the Frenzied Demon Battle Intent to establish his reputation among the God Domain’s Great Profound experts. It was how he’d earned the title “unparalleled!”

Yet now, Luo Tiandu had been badly injured in a direct confrontation. Who wouldn’t have been shocked?

Admittedly, he was only using the power of the Great Martial Stage, but Su Yi was only a mid-stage Immortal King!

From that angle, it was obvious who was superior.

The...
original_title: Chapter 1844 - As Wine Enters my Stomach, I Feel as Joyous as the Wind
